interestingcomments.content: Danke für die Links. Ich muss gestehen, dass ich diesen Fotografen bislang nicht kannte. Immerhin konnte ich jetzt einige seiner großartigen SW-Fotos bewundern, die das unglaubliche Talent dieses türkischen Fotografen belegen. Danke, Aran Guler!

interestingcomments.content: Good idea, and I have been looking at Testflight a couple of times: no update from 0.24.0 for iOS. Meanwhile trying to connect the M10 (Fw 2.6.5.0) to the App did not work. The cameras WLAN was set up, the iPhone or IPad were connected to this WLAN, the App tried to connect but failed. Both times the camera switched from the WLAN menue to Liveview but froze immediately afterwords. Had to take out and reinsert the battery to make it work again. Testing the new app since the very beginning I had a few crashs of the App before but no camera freezes.

interestingcomments.content: 11 hours ago, jcraf said: I was a beta tester for this app, and one day the C Lux Typ 1546 was in the app, and the next it was gone. I even uploaded some images from my C Lux and messed around remotely controlling the camera with the app. I raised it via the beta testing thread, but had no response. Bizarre, given that this is the latest new product released (I exclude the M10-P and M10-D, 'cos they're just M10s as far as the app goes). Well that is annoying that it had already been in the new app. I had applied to be a beta tester but never got notified to download the beta app. Just wish I had been able to compare the beta with the current C-Lux app.
